Rousing Battle Cry.name: Rousing Battle Cry
Rousing Battle Cry.flavor: You loose a stirring shout that rouses injured allies to fight once more.
keywords: Close burst 3  Target: Each ally in the burst  Effect: The target gains 5 temporary hit points. If the target is asleep, it wakens. If the target is prone, it can stand up as a free action.
Rousing Battle Cry.effect: The target gains 5 temporary hit points. If the target is asleep, it wakens. If the target is prone, it can stand up as a free action.

Hold Formation.name: Hold Formation
Hold Formation.flavor: When a foe tries to move you from your position, you brace yourself to keep the battle line intact.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: An enemy’s attack pushes, pulls, or slides you.  Effect: The forced movement does not affect you, and you gain combat advantage against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.
Hold Formation.trigger: An enemy’s attack pushes, pulls, or slides you.
Hold Formation.effect: The forced movement does not affect you, and you gain combat advantage against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.

Plug the Gap.name: Plug the Gap
Plug the Gap.flavor: When a foe tries to escape, you move to intercept it or block its path.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: An enemy within 3 squares of you moves without shifting.  Effect: You shift up to 3 squares to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy. You then mark that enemy until the end of your next turn.
Plug the Gap.trigger: An enemy within 3 squares of you moves without shifting.
Plug the Gap.effect: You shift up to 3 squares to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy. You then mark that enemy until the end of your next turn.

Superior Discipline.name: Superior Discipline
Superior Discipline.flavor: Calling upon your extensive experience in battle, you improve your ability to fight on through hardship.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: You use hobgoblin discipline.  Effect: You regain the use of hobgoblin discipline.
Superior Discipline.effect: You regain the use of hobgoblin discipline.

Tactical Deployment.name: Tactical Deployment
Tactical Deployment.flavor: You shout orders and gesture to your allies, sparking them to move to a more advantageous position.
keywords: Close burst 5  Target: Each ally in the burst  Effect: The target can shift up to half its speed.
Tactical Deployment.effect: The target can shift up to half its speed.

Hobgoblin Discipline.name: Hobgoblin Discipline
Hobgoblin Discipline.flavor: You steel yourself against a harmful effect, and that malady disappears.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: You start your turn subjected to an effect that a save can end.  Effect: The triggering effect ends.
Hobgoblin Discipline.trigger: You start your turn subjected to an effect that a save can end.
